subject: Pan American Games
lead_paragraph: During Cuba’s Pan American Games in 1991, Jim McKay guided a discussion with Fidel Castro skillfully, using his simple, poignant questions to transform the blustery Castro into a regular person.
snippet: During Cuba’s Pan American Games in 1991, Jim McKay guided a discussion with Fidel Castro skillfully, using his simple, poignant questions to transform the blustery Castro into a regular person.
